answerText: Blood Knot[10] This South African author wrote about a man who changes his identity to find work in Sizwe Banzi is Dead. He co-starred in the first production of his play The Blood Knot and also wrote "Master Harold."..and the boys.
heading: MUT |2012 | 3 | 17 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this play, Zach soaks his feet in bath salts every night and much of the action is punctuated by an alarm clock. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which the light skinned Morrie intends to pass as white in front of his brother Zach's pen pal, Ethel Lange, a charade which reveals the brothers' hurtful feelings towards each other.
